testcase.name: Create an account with JPetStorer.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to sign up page........................................passed When User enters necessary details..........................................passed Then Account is created.....................................................passed And User enters invalid data in mandatory fields............................passed Then Error message..........................................................passed And User leaves mandatory fields blank......................................passed Then Error message is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.name: Login through valid credentials.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters Debries and Debries@123....................................passed And User clicks on login....................................................passed Then Logged in successfully.................................................passed And User checks logo........................................................passed Then User finds logo on top left corner.....................................passed And User looks for welcome message..........................................passed Then User reads the welcome message.........................................passed

testcase.name: Search for pet.
testcase.system-out: Given User enters petname in search.........................................passed When User clicks on search..................................................passed Then Respective pets are displayed..........................................passed And User clicks on petId....................................................passed Then Pet varieties are displayed............................................passed And User clicks on certain pet in categories................................passed Then User is navigated to the respective pet page...........................passed And User clicks on product id...............................................passed Then Navigates to the varieties available...................................passed And User clicks on item id..................................................passed Then Respective pet details are displayed...................................passed

testcase.name: Add to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on pet page...................................................passed When User clicks on add to cart.............................................passed Then Navigated to cart......................................................passed And User changes the quantity...............................................passed When User clicks on update cart.............................................passed Then Quantity and amount gets updated.......................................passed And User clicks on remove...................................................passed When Pet is removed from cart...............................................passed Then Cart empty message is displayed........................................passed And User clicks on return to main menu......................................passed Then Navigated to the main menu.............................................passed

testcase.name: Proceed to checkout and place the order.
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to cart and click on checkout..........................passed When Place the order........................................................passed And Order is placed.........................................................passed Then User should see the successfully placed order message..................passed

testcase.name: User should be able to delete order by selecting orderId.
